sentences.sentence: For three years, this issue has been exercising a group of SETI scientists in the International Academy of Astronautics.
sentences.translation: 三年来，这个问题一直在考验着国际宇航科学研究院SETI小组的科学家。

sentences.sentence: He took the course on college students' mental health at Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics (NUAA) in his freshman year.
sentences.translation: 他升入南京航空航天大学第一年时，修了这门有关大学生心理健康的课程。

sentences.sentence: 'Chinese people feel very proud' of the space program, says Huang Hai, a professor at the Beijing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics.
sentences.translation: 北京航空航天大学教授黄海说，中国民众对空间项目感到非常自豪。
